resources.string: Disconnected, Please check your internet connection

The Kelly App is a virtual AI chatbot ("Bot" or "Kelly Bot") that You can chat with, including upon Your choice, the ability to subscribe and to message a highly trained and qualified mental well-being professional ("Kelly Coach" or "Kelly Therapist") or for institutional Users. Your interacttion with the Bot is with an artificial intelligence chatbot and not a human.

This is not intended to be a replacement for face-to-face psychotherapy or to provide a diagram prognosis, treatment or cure for a disease/condition/disorder or disability. The Bot cannot and will not offer advice on issues it dos not recognize. Using the Kelly App.
Kelly App and Service is not intended for use in crisis such as abuse or complex or severe mental health conditions that causes for example; ideation of suicide, harm to self and others.
